subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: John Force returned to the site of the worst crash of his career nearly a year ago. Force, 59, arrived at the Texas Motorplex in Ennis in an Air-Evac Lifeteam helicopter manned by the same crew that took him to the hospital on Sept. 23, 2007. “This was very emotional for me,” Force said. “But I’m glad I did it.”.
